description: This module will explore the theoretical issues in applying psychology in the context of education, and present students with the opportunity to critically analyse the contribution of psychological theories and research to educational issues and school practices. It is also intended for those who wish to have a sound and current understanding of the role of educational psychologists in shaping school practices and policies in general, early childhood and special education.
title: Applying Psychology In Education
